name: DRONE DESTRUCTION PRIMETIME
description:
In DRONE DESTRUCTION PRIMETIME you fight through a warehouse of sentient robots only being able to use weapons once/until they break. Defeat all enemies and a door will open in the center of the map to progress to another level that gets progressively difficult!

CONTROLS ------------------------------------------

  • WASD - to move 
  • Left-CLICK - to shoot 
  • F - to interact with weapon crates
  • EMP Ability - Q key 
  • Bomb Ability - E key
  • Blink Ability - L-Shift Key

CREDITS ---------------------------------------------

Ryan Matthews (Eazyyy) - Design, Programming, Enemy AI

Ron Liew (pdfirefly) - Design, Programming,  Art,  Sound
